website_summaries.verdict: These funnels offer a smooth design and good airflow and are made with high-grade stainless steel that prevents corrosion.
pros: Works well with oil, spices, thick liquids, and dry powders
It has trickle-groove technology to help the funnel avoid blocks
Three funnels of different sizes come with this product, which includes a one-year warranty
cons: Blocks do happen with some ingredients
They don't nest properly at times

customer_reviews.title: Poor flow due to design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: the funnel's spout is bonded to the dish in such a way that there is a lip of metal inside the dish. If you are pouring powder it gets hung up on the lip and takes a lot of jiggling or tapping to get it down the spout. Probably better to go with something plastic or machined brass or where the bond has been smoothed. The lip inside is large enough it would hamper liquid flow as well. All 3 funnels had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Whit G

customer_reviews.title: Funnel does not fit into the opening of the Bellmain 16 oz bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Bellmain set of 16 oz bottles. I ordered this funnel from Bellmain, and it did not fit in the bottle openings. I had to kink the tip to get it to partially fit. I’m not happy that it didn’t fit from the start. Hopefully I did not compromise the integrity of the stainless steel finish that may have been caused from tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie W. Grobe

customer_reviews.title: This thing puts the "fun" in "funnel"
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my shiny new Bellemain funnel, I unpacked it and immediately put it to work. I placed it in the top of an empty bottle and poured water into the wide end. You know what happened? It funneled the water into the bottle. Yup. I then put it on a different bottle and poured olive oil into it. ...and? It funneled. Then I poured balsamic. More funneling! Seems like this thing can funnel anything. Orange juice? no problem. Coffee? you bet. Got Milk? got Funneled milk. Radiator fluid, medium viscosity machine oil, blood? This funnel stands tall, crosses it's arms, and says 'give it to me you putrescent shrew'. That's the kind of funnel I can get behind.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but theres a couple things
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Does the job! The removable center piece of the strainer is very convenient for straining, but it lifts while draining, let's tea through so I need to strain two or three times which is doable but time consuming for large amounts of liquid. Last but not least I've used this a few times per 2 batches of large tea, and there Is a pretty obvious discoloration of the metal. But it fits perfectly into my bottle lids and I'm overall happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anne

customer_reviews.title: I have a refillable mini perfume in my purse and the smallest funnel outs perfect for pouring the perfume into it from my big ..
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small set of funnels and this set exceeds my expectations. I have a refillable mini perfume in my purse and the smallest funnel outs perfect for pouring the perfume into it from my big bottle. No more waste! These are perfect for using for soap and essential oil blending into small bottles. Being that they are made of stainless steel, they are not only easy to clean, they do not absorb odors like plastic ones do. The set of three is on a ring so you can store them together, or take them off the ring if if desired. These can be used for liquid or dry ingredients. There are endless possibilities for uses for these funnels!
customer_reviews.author: Annie K

customer_reviews.title: It comes with a strainer insert that works well and is easy to remove and reinstall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stainless steel funnel because I want to stop using plastic. It comes with a strainer insert that works well and is easy to remove and reinstall. It is very sturdy, and I feel like it is cleaner than using plastic. Due to the excellent quality, I expect to be able to hand this down to my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Curtis

customer_reviews.title: great grease strainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to strain grease out of my fryer and for that it worked perfectly. Afterwards I washed it out and used it to fill my 3 gallon water jugs. For that I would rate it 2-3 stars but for grease it is the bomb. If it starts to rust will adjust but looks to be good quality. I am not going to knock it down simply because it is made in China. If you want to buy American, I support that, just didn't have a bunch of money to strain grease.
customer_reviews.author: edmocon

customer_reviews.title: Handy kitchen funnel for filling water reservoir of one-cup coffee brewer
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to add correct amount of water into fill tank on one-cup coffee brewer to prevent water from spilling. I like having the handle and it is a very attractive and well made funnel. The stainless steel can be washed and dried in the dishwasher. It also has a strainer that comes with the funnel, however, I have not needed it but it does look as if it would work well. Well made and durable. I am pleased with the funnel and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: VickyNC

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel cracked where it attaches to handle
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel is cracked where it attaches to the handle. It seems good quality except for quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to fit in a utensil holder
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel set of three funnels are solid and stands up to heavy dishwasher use. The funnels are small enough to fit in a utensil holder in a drawer making them the perfect size for smaller portion transfers to other vessels like spices, sugar or coffee into glass bottles and other containers. The funnels are far better for sterilization than using the plastic funnels that I have used in the past. They are very easy to clean, simply toss them into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: A+ Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are very good funnels and they are stack-able which I find to be an indispensable quality in a funnel set. I almost gave them 4 stars because they are smaller than I expected... but as I go back and read the description the sizes of the funnels (both mouth and stem) are clearly listed. I wish this company sold larger funnels that these could also stack in. Because of the quality of these I would purchase the larger set from them without considering another brand...
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: The Strainer Part Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this funnel a 5 overall if the removable strainer part was working. The clamp which holds the strainer in place separated and cannot be reattached. It has been like this from the day I received it and I should have returned it, but unfortunately digressed too long. I have been lining the funnel with a piece of cheesecloth since I can't use the strainer part. The funnel itself is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great for straining honey
customer_reviews.text: After several attempts at funnels with strainers I seen this and decided to give it a try based on the high ratings. I buy local honey and it has the honey comb in it. I was looking for a funnel with strainer so I could transfer honey from the jar into a squeeze bottle without getting the honeycomb in it. This worked great! Love the product!! I’m sure I will be using it for many other things. It’s light weight and the handle is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design where spout joins body
customer_reviews.text: Where the spout joins the funnel there's always a ring of liquid (or solid) that is wasted as it doesn't go through into the container. I use a funnel for dry and liquids (mostly liquids) and both have the same problem. Even with water, have to dry the ring where the water stays so the funnel doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: MKR

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect for what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I do all the cooking at home while my dear wife works. Like many people when I need to deep fry something, I use my wok. But breaded items leave behind that nasty overcooked crumbs that didn't survive the trip from bag to plate. So if I only cook a couple of batches, I want to save the oil because it started out fresh. Tea strainers only remove certain size particles whereas this funnel strainer with nylon fine mesh filter media,(sold separately) works perfect for this. Both items fit together perfectly and are sturdy and easy to clean. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Onagain

customer_reviews.title: Great Funnel!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived earlier today in perfect condition. The funnel is fairly sturdy and seems as if it would be difficult to damage so it would be safe from accidental drops. I ordered the funnel because I needed a funnel to fill some glass bottles I purchased recently which come with a small opening and are difficult to fill. The funnel worked exactly as intended and advertised, filling the glass bottles is not longer a messy ordeal. The Bellemain Stainless Steel Funnel is such a great product that I intend on ordering a second one for use in disposing of used cooking oil.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Funnel
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality stainless steel funnel with filter/strainer attachment. I bought this for transferring hummingbird nectar from my sauce pan to feeder and it does the trick. But also will use for iced tea steeped from loose leaf and a myriad of other kitchen functions. It’s sturdy and easy to use. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: FinGurBang

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this funnel to strain the oil from the deep fryer that I recently purchased. I couldn't be more pleased....the funnel is very well made, and is easy to clean. I thought it quite a bargain for the price that I paid. I also use it for moving my dry creamer from a large container into a smaller more manageable container. I'm thrilled that the creamer doesn't cling to the stainless steel, like it did with the plastic funnel that I used to use. Love this strainer and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: pet loverTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy funnel but has a lip at the top of downspout.
customer_reviews.text: Not a straight slope all the way down the funnel into the downspout, so using this for powders like flour or sugar or spices isn't ideal (they sit on the lip of the downspout until shaken in). Very sturdy. Comes with a removable strainer insert.
customer_reviews.author: Button

customer_reviews.title: No lip in funnel bowl! It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this purchase. Hesitantly bought this funnel based on reviews of there being a "lip" or seam within the funnel bowl that inhibits dry ingredients from moving down smoothly. Absolutely not true any longer. The funnel bowl is perfectly smooth, with a well welded lip/seam on the OUTSIDE of the funnel. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sam J

customer_reviews.title: They're funnels. And they're small.
customer_reviews.text: These funnels are not suitable for putting engine oil in your car - they are far too small for that. What they are good for is decanting your essential oil into small bottles without spilling it all over the counter and making sticky (and expensive) messes. If you are hard of hearing, you could try using the larger one in the set as an ear trumpet, but I wouldn't hold your hopes up of it being particularly efficacious for this. They're a bit fiddly to clean, but only because they're small, this job is probably easier if you have dainty little hands, not hams like mine.
customer_reviews.author: JonBrawn

customer_reviews.title: All you need for everything!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice company, with a very nice product! I only needed one funnel to replace my mom's (we all eventually need her funnel we gave away!) I ordered the 5" to fill cocoa mix into small jars for little Christmas gifts. It is well made, easy to grip with the handle, no sharp edges, stable, and the little strainer I did not think I needed, will come in handy! This funnel is a very convenient kitchen addition. Go ahead. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Three funnels for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for and 3 sizes to choose from too! I love the ring that keeps them all together. I wanted stainless steel as I did not to take the chance that oil or spices might leave a residue on plastic even after washing. If you want a well made product that will last, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Best small funnel set I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've been distilling essential oils and making my own tinctures in-house for awhile now. All that time using a hodgepodge of funnels from around the house. Much of what is made is time consuming and quite valuable so spillage really can be a vital waste. These three funnels are not only well made and thought out in design, but they are perfect for the variety of small bottles essential oils are typically found in - from .5 ounces to a quart. Very pleased with the purchase every time they are used.
customer_reviews.author: DMJBeerman

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Stell & Narrow tubes
customer_reviews.text: The narrow tube on the smallest funnel allows me to refill small bottles. Stainless steel is easier to clean well than plastic. Stainless steel doesn't generate static sparks as does plastic. Some powders, such as flour, can provide fuel for a combustible air-fuel mixture, that static sparks in a plastic funnel could detonate. I think powders slide better down a static-free metal funnel. SS is less toxic than Aluminum. SS doesn't rust, unlike tin.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Great for re-using cooking oil.
customer_reviews.text: I received this funnel in perfect shape and on time. I needed something to transfer the oil from a deep fry pan into a plastic storage container for reuse. The funnel worked perfectly, filtering out all of the large particles but allowing the oil and small particles to pass through. I give it a rating of 5 out of 5. No issues at all, great product
customer_reviews.author: Coolcar1

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use it. The strainer piece broke the first time I removed it from the funnel. Totally bummed. I really needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Matter What Happens from Here, My Kitchen Funnel Problems Are Over!
customer_reviews.text: Life has a way of throwing a lot of flack at me. But one thing's for sure, no matter how bad things get, my funnel needs in the kitchen are solved for good! Whether it's transferring fry oil back into the container for storage or...well, that's all I have used it for at the moment. But man, does it solve that problem handily. A sturdy, easy-to-clean funnel that's always ready for action. I'll sleep better tonight just knowing it's got my back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solved a simple problem for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes chai making much quicker. Used to use a mesh strainer for the spices and it just never sat well on the vessel the tea went into. This sits perfectly on the vessel and only the smallest of grains might get through (no biggie to me). Easy to clean, goes into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: TinyHill

customer_reviews.title: Two flow options
customer_reviews.text: Nice little funnel. Has a feature that i discovered. Set funnel over bottle in vertical position with the stainless steel filter insert and the flow is very slow. Useful if your liquid foams. Then with a slight tilt of the funnel and the flow increases. I really don't know how this works but it does. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fadetogrey

customer_reviews.title: I like to carry my coffee in a little thermos bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile , it makes the chores easier and quick and neat. I like to carry my coffee in a little thermos bottle like a cup of hot coffee after I added sugar and milk and then pouring into 9 oz bottle is a challenge , so by having this funnel it makes it super easy so I can sip my coffee hot all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable.
customer_reviews.text: Three (petite) sizes, perfect for jars, bottles, what-have-you. Everyone needs these. I misplaced mine and immediately ordered another set, because I could not envision doing without them. When I found those I had *temporarily* lost I was glad to have both sets!
customer_reviews.author: The Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Sits sturdy on small or large bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Kombucha making and bottling was what I primarily purchased this for. However, it is such a wonderful handy item to have in the kitchen, that I recommend getting one just to have. Sat perfectly level on top of small or larger bottles and the strainer works great and is very easy to remove. Washes easy & sturdy and looks like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: New at this!

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, too small to do anything with
customer_reviews.author: OJ1209

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are used for filling flasks with liquor. The tubes are too skinny for anything other than straight from a bottle. I wanted something for pouring a mixed cocktail from one cup to another cup. These can't do that. Too small. For a variety pack I expected 1 of them to be a little bigger. They do not vary much in size.
customer_reviews.author: Sjaan Hydrick

customer_reviews.title: Check size.
customer_reviews.text: Well the product was smaller than expected. However they are perfect for other jobs. I have a bottle of hand soap that can now be transferred, but a gallon of tea that won’t work with this device. Overall all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Kitchen Utility
customer_reviews.text: Large mouthed funnel is very useful in kitchen. Not flimsy like plastic ones. Strainer adds additional functionality. I like this for when I'm making soups and gravies. You can filter out most of what you don't want with the liquid. You can also easily use cheesecloth with this for finer straining.
customer_reviews.author: Book Glutton

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled to find these funnels
customer_reviews.text: This set of 3 funnels will serve many functions in my kitchen and clean easily in my dishwasher without turning yellow like my old plastic funnel has done. In addition, I was looking for a tiny funnel to use to put rinse aid into my dishwasher's dispenser. Why are these always so hard to fill? The littlest funnel in the set fit perfectly into the little hole in my dishwasher door and voila! - a full dispenser and no spilling. I finally found the perfect solution to a long-time problem. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Furst

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the strong stainless steel, that it has a handle (I lose count of how many times I've spilled trying to tip liquid into the funnel and keep the funnel level somehow), and that it's dishwasher safe. Speedy delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for filling small bottles.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for filling small bottles (e.g. spices, liquids.) They are very good quality and have a unique design in the spout to direct your powders or liquids into your container. There are 3 convenient sized funnels.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the 5th one I've bought I like it that much
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect funnel with a strainer that fits snug into the funnel and can be removed for cleaning. I really like this so much I have bought a separate one for various applications. A great feature is the small indentation running down the stem so the funnel gets air when it is put into a tight bottle neck. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Réka Domokos

customer_reviews.title: Fooled by the 5-star rating
customer_reviews.text: The fault in these is their shape. There is a bell at the bottom and a lip on the inside where the top attaches to the stem, so you are always left with about 1/2 tsp of liquid (or whatever you are funneling). It's terrible, really :( It is basically rendering them useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We brew kombucha and use this to fill bottles. I sanitize it with vinegar. It cleans easy, works perfect. I haven’t yet had a need for the filter attachment, but it clips right in and stays put. It’s a good quality funnel, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AimeeP

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! You won’t need them everyday but man do they come in handy when you do need them. For instance, filling my olive oil dispenser from a larger jug I keep under the counter. These are small enough to fit in the opening of the dispenser when a regular funnel is just too big. They are great to just have handy in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jepson

customer_reviews.title: The one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great strainer, the finish is nice and smooth to make an easy to clean surface. Not a lot you can dish about on a strainer/funnel (dish about... get it ?) but the handle and overall construction are great. I highly recommend these, no discounts etc. just an honest review of a great deal on a good product. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: shirl s jones

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Funnel!
customer_reviews.text: I have decreased dexterity and the longer spout helps me to not spill while transferring From one container to another. It’s easy to clean and it even has a screen that you can leave in or take out as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: These are high-quality and I like!
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple purchase of course but it's one that I like the type of stainless that they used because it doesn't stain and does not rust. there are different grades of stainless and a lot of them do rust even though they say they shouldn't. Good job with this product!
customer_reviews.author: JB Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good Funnels.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been on me to buy small funnels and found these after much research. I’ve learned to do research! Couldn’t be happier. Perfect for our needs. I like stainless steel. Appear well made and excellent for those tiny bottles that need refills.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Funnel
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, just what I was looking for. I wasn't sure about the prongs going into the tube part of the funnel that holds the strain but necessary as the old one I had floated off.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lee

customer_reviews.title: HANDY FOR SMALL JOBS
customer_reviews.text: Very small funnel set. I just got this set and haven't used it yet but I know it will be handy in my kitchen for filling small jars and lunch items. My other funnels are too big for some jobs which is why I ordered these. I will be putting them to good use. They seem to be very good quality and I am happy to have been able to buy these that are not toxic plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia N.

customer_reviews.title: thin-stemmed funnels
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thin-stemmed funnel that could fit into a thin-necked Oregano bottle. The middle-sized funnel fit right into the bottle. The smallest of the 3 funnels is even smaller. I chose to order this brand because the smallest was .19 inches, to be sure that I got a funnel that would fit.
customer_reviews.author: JohnL

customer_reviews.title: Great Funnel
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just what I was looking for. Like how easy it is to fill small mouth containers with liquids using this funnel. Good design. Good quality steel. Good size. Works like it says it will. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fergy

customer_reviews.title: Good Funnels
customer_reviews.text: These funnels perform as advertised. I use the largest one for my G-tube syringe. The stainless steel seems to be of high quality (although time will tell if it rusts, hopefully not). It cleans up a lot easier than the plastic funnel I had used where the liquid would crud the stem.
customer_reviews.author: LEJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Self storing funnels
customer_reviews.text: 1000 uses around the kitchen. I always seemed to need a small funnel set and finally chose these. They are good quality, easy to store and really functional for pouring liquid and spices into small bottles. Give them a try. You will wonder how you lived so long without them!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Well Made SS Funnels
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for stainless steel funnels and these are perfect. You get three sizes which pretty much covers all the different uses I have. I would recommend these. I did notcheck off durability since I've only had them for a few weeks - so far they remain as new.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Great Funnel!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived as I was getting groceries put away. I actually unpacked the funnel to use it immediately to fill my spice jars. Worked great! Also tested it on a bottle without holding the funnel to see if I could pour a large pan of water into it without the funnel tipping. Sometimes you need both hands to pour. Perfect! The strainer has prongs that help keep it in place. It’s a great looking product. Very happy with it. Bought a second for a Mother’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.author: apple tv

customer_reviews.title: works great for liquids or solids
customer_reviews.text: like the whole funnel, particularity the long 'neck' makes it easy to fill bottles of most any size and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: due to the fact they came in a envelope & it was pretty beat up
customer_reviews.text: Just received them today. They are exactly what I am looking for. May order another set for the husbands shop. To be honest was worried they may be bent up, due to the fact they came in a envelope & it was pretty beat up, but luckly they were fine. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rebecky F

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. I bought to fill diffuser. Works great and is easy to clean. The metal doesn't absorb odors from the essential oils. Only smallest worked for my diffuser but I will use others for soap and spices.
customer_reviews.author: loriell

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful funnel
customer_reviews.text: I have use plastic funnels in the past and they melt under the heat of my riding mower. This funnel is used to safely place grain into mole runs, without spilling any that would harm local pets. It works great for this use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken the Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size and has a little strainer to help with pulp from juicing. Perfect to do the job, and stainless steel, so it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Linda

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and useful features
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed funnel with welded handle. Strainer has "feet" that hold it in place. A bit lighter than one we bought years ago, but still a decent gauge steel. The lip on the edge gives it good rigidity. We'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Glassy Raven

customer_reviews.title: Multitasking Funnel
customer_reviews.text: There are many choices in funnels. This one reflects quality that comes from stainless steel and careful craftsmanship. The removable strainer is a valuable addition as it can serve the function of straing liquid e.g. cooking oil after frying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Must have kitchen utensil.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 'funnel' for my kitchen on my list for quite some time and finally ran across this one. Very durable, and practical. the different sizes are very helpful as well and give options depending on the size of the container you're pouring into. LAstly, the ring was surprisingly helpful because I can hang it as opposed to finding space for it in a drawer or cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: ACEO

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I have found myself buying more stainless steel these days. I needed a small funnel as I am experimenting with making my own herbal treatments. I needed one small enough to pour my elderberry syrup into the small dropper bottles. These are perfect. I do recommend these funnels.
customer_reviews.author: N Welch

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars but stem will not fit inside Bellmain 16oz. bottles
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek design and durable. As stated per another reviewer, and oddly enough, the stem of this funnel will not fit in some 16oz bottles. It WILL fit in ILYAPA bottles. It WILL NOT fit in Chef Star bottles (based on the ones I have, at least).
customer_reviews.author: prepsphere

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This funnel set works GREAT for me. Even though they're small, they can be utilize in many ways. If you're tired of your larger funnel(s) falling out of your smaller jars/containers these are a great purchase. I've utilize all three (s) funnels since purchase. "Flowing Liquids."
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 16oz swing top bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this funnel/strainer to make my elderberry syrup. It fits perfect in my 16oz swing top bottles, ensures no elderberries or spices get into the syrup, and the handle makes it simple for me to push out those last little bits of elderberry goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, friendly company.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I expected, but they were properly advertised as mini and size is listed under the description. Regardless of that they are well made and worth the price. The long narrow bottom is perfect for what I needed it for. The company Perella's was very friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Funnel
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this funnel as it will allow me to drain the cooking oil from my pan and catch all the residual food drippings
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good materials
customer_reviews.text: Really like these little funnel, good for transferring oils to small bottles, nice material easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: YesYoga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent funnel.  Great design and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this funnel on Amazon, needing a stainless steel funnel that would fill my DMSO into glass bottles and it performed the task perfectly. I strongly recommend this great product. Outstanding design.

customer_reviews.title: works great to strain peanut oil after frying
customer_reviews.text: works great to strain peanut oil after frying. The oil can be used 50 times if it is strained properly. This funnel makes it easy. The long tube on the bottom keeps the funnel upright in the container so you don't have to worry about it flipping out.

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I make my own essential oil rubs, e juice, paints all sorts of things in all sizes of bottles and these are awesome. One size replaces a plastic funnel I have used for years for mixing essential oils, but it was hard to clean. These are worth every penny.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent sturdy funnel for filling bottles. Works best if slightly lifted when pouring. When set on a bottle mouth the vacuum slows the drainage.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for spices!
customer_reviews.text: These tiny funnels are perfect for filling spice jars or salt and pepper shakers. I also make my own infused oils and spice blends, so these are perfect for transferring to small bottles. I also love the ring they come on. It holds them together so they don't get lost, but comes apart easily for when you need to use the funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Addie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I own and operate a upscale gourmet culinary shop in which we blend teas and spices and need a easy to clean funnel. These funnels really hit the mark of us as they are made of solid metal which resists odors, scents and essential oils from the ingredients we use in our mixes. Also because they are composed of metal, the funnels dont carry a static charge to help items from sticking on the sides and it is very easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Handy little funnels in my kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Works great

product_meta.title: Bellemain Funnel Stainless steel (3 pc small funnel set)
feature_bullets: WHEN ONLY THE BEST MINI FUNNEL WILL DO: We know conventional funnels back up or wobble when filling, so we went searching for the answer. After a lot of trial and error, we found the solution. Now, whether using it with thin-necked oil and vinegar dispensers, salt and pepper shakers, hot sauce containers, hip flasks, spices, herbs, aromatherapy bottles or beyond, our perfectly sloped, carefully balanced funnel provides the smoothest filling.

MORE AIRFLOW WITH TRICKLE-GROOVE TECHNOLOGY: Sometimes with small amounts of ingredients, blocks happen. But Bellemain’s mini funnels are custom made with a trickle groove embedded down its stem to allow for more airflow and maintain a steady flow that big kitchen funnels envy.

THE NO-CORROSION PROMISE | HIGHEST-GRADE STAINLESS STEEL: With 18% chromium for maximum corrosion resistance, your mini funnel set will stay beautiful and safe for years. The professional food-grade stainless steel that makes up these funnels also resists breaking, bending, scratching, and rusting.
NO OPENING TOO SMALL: Set includes 3 nested stainless steel funnels: 2.75"W mouth with 0.5"W stem; 2"W mouth with 0.31"W stem; and 1.5"W mouth with 0.19"W stem.

OUR 1-YEAR “YOU’LL LOVE THEM” WARRANTY: We know you don’t want to miss a drop while pouring your spices, perfumes, hip flasks and hot sauces. Bellemain Mini Funnels are guaranteed to perform to your satisfaction or we replace them free.
